endurance.title: Endurance
endurance.tagline: Swimming, biking, running, and indoor rowing workouts

bodyweight.title: Bodyweight
bodyweight.tagline: Bodyweight only workouts (some may require pull-up bar, jump rope, rings, and/or plyo box)

kettlebells.title: Kettlebells
kettlebells.tagline: Workouts involving one or more kettlebell exercises

singlets.title: Singlets
singlets.tagline: Single element workouts - weightlifting (W), endurance (M), or bodyweight (B)

couplets.title: Couplets
couplets.tagline: Two element workouts - WM, BM, WW, WB, etc...

triplet.title: Triplets
triplet.tagline: Three element workouts - BWM, WBM, WWB, BBB, etc...

hybrids.title: Hybrids
hybrids.tagline: Mixed-modal workouts, four or more exercises performed for multiple rounds

chipper.title: Chippers
chipper.tagline: Multiple exercises in single round format

amrap.title: AMRAP
amrap.tagline: Work priority WODs - As Many Rounds As Possible

hero.title: Hero
hero.tagline: Main site WODs named in honor of fallen Mil/LEO

strength-bias.title: Strength Bias
strength-bias.tagline: Short duration heavy metcons consistent with CFSB programming

emotm.title: EMOTM
emotm.tagline: Every Minute On The Minute WODs (including Death By WOD)

strongman.title: Strongman
strongman.tagline: Workouts involving a variety of Strongman implements and movements. Scale accordingly!
